trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The werebear has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked {@condition prone} by the bear must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The werebear makes two attacks with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage and the target suffers one additional effect of the werebear's choice.
The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and {@condition restrained} if it is a medium or smaller creature.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 ft. away and knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or have one item it is holding knocked out of its grip and flung 10 ft. away.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specific Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackalwere's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of one or more jackalweres that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep for the next minute. A creature wakes early if it takes damage, or if another creature uses its action to wake it.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the jackalwere until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) dégâts perforants.

action.name: Vicious Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, this attack deals an additional 7 damage.

monster.name: The Sun That Empties Hell, Anathema Ascendant

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Blessed and Chosen
entries: When the anathema dies, its six heads each tear away from the body and immediately travel 15 feet. They act on the anathema's initiative, have AC 17 and 1 HP, and can't take actions other than to dash. If any remain alive after 24 hours, one reforms into a new body for the anathema, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again.

trait.name: Ascended Soul (Mythic Trait, recharges after a Short or Long rest)
entries: When the anathema is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it gains 189 temp HP and sprouts wings of light, gaining an 80 foot fly speed, a fourth legendary action each round, and it immediately regains all spent legendary actions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anathema makes two claw attacks, one constrict attack, and one Flurry of Bites attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the anathema can't constrict another target.

action.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Drain Essence {@recharge 5}
entries: One target creature within 10 feet must make a DC17 Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, the target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage, or half as much on a success. If the target is reduced to 0 HP, they also have their constitution score reduced by {@dice 3d6}. If the target is a Yuan Ti, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage.

action.name: Compel Submission (1/Day)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet must make a DC17 Wisdom Save or be {@condition charmed} and compelled to kneel before the anathema. This effect ends if the anathema takes any hostile action toward a {@condition charmed} creature or or someone uses an action to shake the {@condition charmed} creature out of its stupor.

reaction.name: Divine Backlash
entries: When the anathema passes a saving throw against a magical effect, it may use its reaction to deal 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage to the spellcaster.

legendary.name: Claw (1 Action):
entries: Xibalbabalaam moves up to half his speed and makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Secrete Acid
entries: Xibalbabalaam coats himself in acid. The next creature to start its turn {@condition grappled} by the anathema must make a {@dc 19} Constitution Saving Throw or suffer vulnerability to the next source of radiant damage it takes.

legendary.name: Burst with Light (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet must make a {@dc 19} Constitution Saving Throw or be take {@damage 4d8} radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn. A {@condition grappled} creature has disadvantage on this save.

legendary.name: Solar Flare (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature in a 5 foot wide, 60 foot long line must make a {@dc 19} Constitution Saving Throw or suffer {@damage 5d8} radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn, or half as much on a success.

mythicHeader: If the anathema's mythic trait is active, it may use the options below as legendary actions for one hour after using its ascended soul ability.

mythic.name: Divine Utterance (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature of the anathema's choice that can hear it must make a {@dc 19} Charisma save or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition deafened} for one minute. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also {@condition blinded} and {@condition frightened} for the next minute. A creature that fails this save by 10 or more also drops to 0 HP.

mythic.name: Breath of Dawn (Costs 4 Actions)
entries: Six 5 foot wide, 60 foot long lines emanate from the anathema. Each creature in at least one of them must make a {@dc 19} Constitution Saving Throw or suffer 42 ({@damage 12d6}) radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn, or half as much on a success.

If any remain alive after 24 hours, one reforms into a new body for the anathema, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again.

entries: While in sunlight, the yuan-ti adds {@dice 1d4} to the result of any attack roll or Charisma check it makes.

entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Slither Strike
entries: Other creatures can't take reactions on the yuan-ti's turn.

trait.name: Coils of Despair
entries: A creature that starts its turn {@condition grappled} by the yuan-ti must succced on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} unti the beginning of its next turn.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and can't breathe, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another targets.

reaction.name: Tail Lash
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the yuan-ti's reach, the yuan-ti may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet backwards and knocked {@condition prone}. A creature has advantage on this save if the yuan-ti has a creature {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the yuan-ti has {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the yuan-ti crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature immediately begins to suffocate.

trait.name: Blessed by the Sun

trait.name: Magic Resistance

trait.name: Serpent's Glory
entries: Friendly yuan-ti within 30 feet of the Pit Master may use its attack bonus, rather than their own.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti attacks once with its Flurry of Bites and uses its Sinuous Command. If it has fewer than 69 hit points, it may instead attack twice with its Flurry of Bites.

action.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Sinuous Command
entries: One friendly yuan-ti may use its reaction to move up to half its speed and take an action. If it does, it can't take actions on its following turn, other than to disengage.

reaction.name: Embrace the Swarm
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 69 hit points, the yuan-ti transforms into a swarm of venemous snakes. Its statistics remain the same, except it can occupy another creature's space and it has resistance to blugeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Fed by Terror
entries: At the beginning of its turn, if one creature within 60 feet is {@condition frightened} of it, the yuan-ti increases its size to Large. If two or more creatures within 60 feet are {@condition frightened} of it, the yuan-ti instead increases its size to Huge. If no creatures within 60 feet are {@condition frightened} of it, it reverts to its normal size.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks if it is size Medium, three attacks if it is size Large, and four attacks if it is size Huge, one of which may be with its Bite.

The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} for the next minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. ending the effect on a success.

The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Subtle Shift
entries: One creature within 60 feet that is {@condition poisoned} must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's perceives one ally in range as an enemy, or one enemy in range as an ally, for as long as it remains {@condition poisoned}.

entries: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide from creatures more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troglodyte makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage and the target can't benefit from magical healing until the start of the troglodyte's next turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the troglodyte can grapple the target (escape {@dc 12}).

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The thri-kreen is {@condition invisible} to creatures more than 30 feet away from it.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Predatory Grappler
entries: The thri-kreen has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it. If it has a creature {@condition grappled}, it may make a bite attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target suffers a critical hit on a roll of 11-20. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the thri-kreen can grapple the target (escape {@dc 11}) and pull the target 5 ft. towards it.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 103 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 2 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Deep Shadow
entries: Areas of dim light or darkness within 15 ft. of the shadar-kai count as difficult terrain for creatures of its choice. Hostile creatures that start their turn in the area, or enter the area for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes two attacks with its sickle and uses either its Curse of Beshadowed Mind or Curse of the Bloody Tongue.

action.name: Corrupting Blackfire
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage and catch fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns and can't benefit from healing magic.

action.name: Curse of Beshadowed Mind
entries: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, the range of the creature's darkvision, if it has it, is reduced to 10 ft., and the creature has disadvantage on Dexterity and Wisdom saving throws while in bright light

action.name: Curse of the Bloody Tongue
entries: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, whenever the creature attempts to speak or cast a spell it must first succeed on a {@dc 16} Consitution saving throw or be unable to speak or breathe this turn.

reaction.name: Snuff
entries: As a reaction to a source of light entering the radius of its Deep Shadow trait, the shadar-kai extinguishes it.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 96 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 1 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Umbral Weapon
entries: The shadar-kai treats its spear as arbitrarily long (up to 120 ft.), as long as the attack doesn't pass through or into any areas of bright light.

trait.name: Armor of Years
entries: A creature that hits the gloom weaver with a melee attack takes 25 necrotic damage and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or age {@dice 1d4 x 5} years. This trait is then disrupted until the end of its next turn. The aging effect can be reversed with a {@spell greater restoration} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes two attacks with its darkspear.

action.name: Darkspear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be disoriented, making attacks at disadvantage until the end of its next turn. Additionally, a creature that fail this save falls {@condition prone} if it misses with a melee attack on its next turn.

reaction.name: Shadow Juant
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the shadar-kai magically teleports up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and to must be in dim light or darkness. Until the beginning of its next turn, the shadar-kai has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

entries: While it has fewer than 90 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy

trait.name: Veil of Shadows
entries: The shadar-kai is {@condition invisible} while in dim light or darkness.

trait.name: Shadow Weft
entries: A shadar-kai within 30 ft. that hits with a melee attack increases its movement by 5 and doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity until the end of its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes two attacks with its blade and uses its Gloom Cage, if available.

action.name: Blackened Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} while in Bright Light for the next minute. An affected creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Gloom Cage {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to two creatures within 30 ft. in dim light or darkness must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 15}) as wisps of darkness tether it in place for the next minute, or until it is exposed to bright light.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 69 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 4 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Backswing
entries: If the shadar-kai misses with a melee attack, its next melee attack this turn is made at advantage.

trait.name: Shadow Portals
entries: The shadar-kai treates any two areas of dim light or darkness within 30 ft. as adjacent to each other for the purposes of making attacks, linked by portals that appear as the shadar-kai attacks with its chain sickle and disappear as the chain sickle is retracted through them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes three attacks with its spiked chain and uses its shadow jump.

action.name: Chain Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or suffer one additional effect of the shadar-kai's choice. The shadar-kai may not choose the same effect twice in a turn:
The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and {@condition restrained} if it is a medium or smaller creature. The shadar-kai may grapple only one creature this way.
The target is knocked {@condition prone}.

The target is pulled up to 10 ft. toward the shadar-kai. If this movement pulls the creature through one of the shadar-kai's shadow portals, the creature takes an additional 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shadow Jump
entries: The shadar-kai magically teleports up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and to must be in dim light or darkness.

entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 4 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shadows of the Raven Queen

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes three attacks with its kukris. If at least two of these attacks hit the same creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the shadar-kai's next turn.

action.name: Shadestrike Kukris
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Darkened Dodge
entries: As a reaction to being targeted by an attack while in dim light or darkness, the shadar-kai teleports up to 15 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. If this movement makes it an invalid target for the triggering attack, the attack misses.

entries: While it has fewer than 65 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Blackfire Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage. The target is unaffected by the next source of healing it receives before the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Curse of Beshadowed Mind {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, the range of the creature's darkvision, if it has it, is reduced to 10 ft., and the creature has disadvantage on Dexterity and Wisdom saving throws while in bright light

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 47 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 3 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Backswing
entries: If the shadar-kai misses with a melee attack, its next melee attack this turn is made at advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes two attacks with its spiked chain and uses its shadow jump.

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or suffer one additional effect of the shadar-kai's choice. The shadar-kai may not choose the same effect twice in a turn:
The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) and {@condition restrained} if it is a medium or smaller creature. The shadar-kai may grapple only one creature this way.
The target is knocked {@condition prone}.
The target is pulled up to 5 ft. toward the shadar-kai.

action.name: Shadow Jump
entries: The shadar-kai magically teleports up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and to must be in dim light or darkness.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 30 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 2 until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Cruel Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage. If this damage triggers a saving throw to maintain Concentration, the save is made at disadvantage.

action.name: Gloom Cage {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 ft. in dim light or darkness must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 12}) as wisps of darkness tether it in place for the next minute, or until it is exposed to bright light.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Drowner

entries: The ratfolk may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

reaction.name: Sticky Shield
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee weapon attack, the kuo-toa uses its sticky shield to catch the weapon. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw, or the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. A creature may free its weapon as an action or bonus action with a successful {@dc 11} Strength (Athletics) check.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Flimsy Bravado
entries: If the kobold misses a creature with an attack, its speed increases by 15 feet until the end of its turn, and attacks of opportunity are made against it at disadvantage.

action.name: Inspire Valor {@recharge}
entries: Each friendly kobold within 30 feet gains {@dice 2d4} temporary HP.

action.name: Draconic Blessing
entries: The kobold blesses up to three target creatures within 30 feet. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the end of the scalepriest's next turn, the target can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

trait.name: Smoking Censer
entries: A 20 foot radius cloud of hazy smoke surrounds the kobold, rendering the area lightly obscured.

action.name: Censer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage. On a critical hit, the target must make a {@dc 10} Strength Saving Throw or be disarmed, dropping a single item it's holding.

action.name: Firebolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Fearsome Ventriloquy (3/Day)
entries: The kobold conjures a fearsome illusory voice that emanates from a point within 120 feet, giving the impression that a powerful creature is about to join the fray. Each creature of the kobold's choice must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence Saving Throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the kobold's next turn. A creature that succeeds on its save is immune to this ability for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Illusory Wyrmling (1/Day)
entries: The kobold creates a medium shadowy dragon in an unoccupied space that it can see within 120 feet. The illusion lasts for 1 minute, or until it loses concentration (as if it were concentrating on a spell). As a bonus action, the kobold can move the illusion up to 60 feet. At any point during its movement, it can cause the illusion to exhale a blast of energy in a 15-foot cone originating from its space. Each creature in the cone must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw, taking {@damage 3d6} fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Throw Hunting Trap (3/Day)
entries: The kobold hurls a saw-toothed steel ring at a creature within 10 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity Saving Throw or suffer {@damage 1d4} piercing damage as the trap snaps shut on them. Until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is reduced by 5 feet and it can't take reactions. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 12} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach from a trap on a success. Each failed check deals 1 piercing damage to the trapped creature.

action.name: Quick Snare (1/Day)
entries: The kobold rapidly sets a magical snare, designating a 5 foot radius circle that it touches. The first time a creature steps into the circle, the trap is triggered. The triggering creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity Saving Throw or or fall {@condition prone} and be hoisted into the air where it hangs upside down 3 feet above the protected surface, where it is {@condition restrained}.

monster.name: Kenku Shingler
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom (Insight) check.

trait.name: Flock Tactics
entries: While adjacent to two or more kenku, a creature has disadvantage on attacks that target one of them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kenku makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Sharpened Shingle
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. This attack scores a critical on a 17-20 against a creature at lower elevation than the kenku.

action.name: Thrashing Lunge {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage and be pushed 15 ft away, or take half as much damage on a success.
A creature that succeeds by 5 or more takes no damage and may use its reaction to make an attack against the kenku.
Reaction

action.name: Harrass
entries: As a reaction to a creature in range missing an ally of the kenku's with a melee atttack, the kenku makes a sharpened shingle  attack against the attacker.

items.name: Astral Stride
entries: At the end of the githyanki's turn roll a {@dice d20}. On an 11 or higher it vanishes into the Ethereal plane, returning to the Material plane at the start of its next turn to an unoccupied space within 10 ft. of its departure.

items.name: Teleport
entries: The githyanki teleports up to 30 ft. to a location it can see.

items.name: Psychic Shroud
entries: The githyanki becomes {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn, or until it makes an attack or casts a spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githzerai makes two attacks, one of which it may replace with a spell.

action.name: Silver Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Thunderblast (2nd level spell)
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. cone must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage and be pushed 10 ft away, or half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Fireball (3rd level spell, Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 20 ft. radius centered on a point within 120 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Iron Mind
entries: As a reaction to failing an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw, the githyanki rerolls the save with advantage.

reaction.name: Disrupt Dweomer (2nd level spell)
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature cast a spell of 3rd level or below within 60 feet, the githyanki negates the spell.

trait.name: Dragonrider
entries: While riding a dragon or similar creature, the githyanki acts on its mount's initiative, rather than rolling its own, and it has advantage on attack rolls against creatures smaller than its mount.

trait.name: Psionic Empowerment
entries: As a bonus action, the githyanki gains one of the following benefits until the beginning of its next turn.

items.name: Telekinetic Leap
entries: The githyanki's standing long jump and standing high jump are both equal to its movement speed.

items.name: Telekinetic Shove
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the githyanki can see must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 ft. away from the githyanki.

items.name: Telekinetic Trip
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the githyanki can see must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two attacks with its greatsword, and uses its psychic feedback, if available.

action.name: Silver Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Feedback {@recharge 5}
entries: The githyanki targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. Until the end of the githyanki's next turn, whenever that creature takes or deals psychic damage it takes an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Iron Mind
entries: As a reaction to failing an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw, the githyanki rerolls the save with advantage.

trait.name: Psionic Empowerment
entries: As a bonus action, the githyanki gains one of the following benefits until the beginning of its next turn.

items.name: Telekinetic Leap
entries: The githyanki's standing long jump and standing high jump are both equal to its movement speed.

items.name: Mindslice
entries: The githyanki's melee attacks have a reach of 60 ft. and deal psychic damage instead of any other type.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two attacks, one of which it may replace with its psychic feedback, if available.

action.name: Silver Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The githyanki targets each creature in a 5 ft. radius centered on a point within 30 ft. Until the end of the githyanki's next turn, whenever a target creature takes or deals psychic damage it takes an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Iron Mind
entries: As a reaction to failing an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw, the githyanki rerolls the save with advantage.

trait.name: Psionic Empowerment
entries: As a bonus action, the githyanki gains one of the following benefits until the beginning of its next turn.

items.name: Telekinetic Leap
entries: The githyanki's standing long jump and standing high jump are both equal to its movement speed.

items.name: Telekinetic Trip
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the githyanki can see must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two attacks with its greatsword, one of which it may replace with its psychic feedback, if available.

action.name: Silver Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Feedback {@recharge}
entries: The githyanki targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. Until the end of the githyanki's next turn, whenever that creature takes or deals psychic damage it takes an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Iron Mind
entries: As a reaction to failing an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw, the githyanki rerolls the save with advantage.

trait.name: Honourable Fealty
entries: While the giff is within 60 feet of a giff of higher CR, it may reroll up to two damage dice on each of its turns. If it does so, it must use the new roll.

trait.name: Null Hide
entries: The giff has resistance to damage from spells of third level or below. It cannot use or be targeted by magic items.

trait.name: Danger Close
entries: The Giff lives for the music of battle. It has resistance to damage from magical or nonmagical effects that affect a sphere or cube. If the giff fails a saving throw against such an effect, its next attack is made at advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Giff uses its Impact Grenade twice. It may replace one of these with a use of its Juggernaut Charge.

action.name: Impact Grenade
entries: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet. Each creature within 15 feet of the grenade's detonation must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that succeeds on this save by 5 or more and has a free hand may use its reaction to catch the grenade, preventing its detonation. A giff leftenant typically carries eight grenades at a time.

action.name: Juggernaut Charge
entries: The giff attempts to shove a creature. If it succeeds, it may make another shove attempt against the same target, and continue doing so until it fails or runs out of movement. The target then takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each 5 feet it was pushed.

reaction.name: Aim, You Buffoons!
entries: As a reaction to seeing a friendly creature miss with an attack, the Giff berates its allies. Each friendly creature that can hear it gains advantage on the next attack it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Honourable Fealty
entries: While the giff is within 60 feet of a giff of higher CR, it may reroll up to two damage dice on each of its turns. If it does so, it must use the new roll.

trait.name: Null Hide
entries: The giff has resistance to damage from spells of second level or below. It cannot use or be targeted by magic items.

trait.name: Danger Close
entries: The Giff lives for the music of battle. It has resistance to damage from magical or nonmagical effects that affect a sphere or cube. If the giff fails a saving throw against such an effect, its next attack is made at advantage.

action.name: Cavalry Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Flintlock Pistols
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage. The giff has a brace of eight pistols, each of which may fire once before requiring a short rest to fire again.

action.name: Pack More Powder!
entries: The giff overstuffs its musket with powder. The next shot the giff fires with it deals 6 ({@damage 1d12}) additional damage, to a maximum of 13 ({@damage 2d12}) additional damage.

action.name: Musket {@recharge 4}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) piercing damage. If this attack deals 20 or more damage, the wielder takes half as much damage as fire damage.

action.name: Juggernaut Charge
entries: The giff attempts to shove a creature. If it succeeds, it may make another shove attempt against the same target, and continue doing so until it fails or runs out of movement. The target then takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each 10 feet it was pushed.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the firenewt takes cold damage, it cannot make more than one attack on its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The firenewt makes two attacks with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Regrow Limb
entries: THe firenewt regrows one missing limb, which bursts out in a gout of scalding steam. The firenewt regains the use of its limb, and each creature in a 15 ft. cone must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and be unable to speak or breathe until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Drop Limb
entries: As a reaction to taking 6 or more damage, the firenewt drops one of its limbs, reducing the damage taken to 5. A firenewt that drops an arm loses the use of either its scimitar or shield. A firenewt that drops a leg reduces its maximum speed by half.

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, psionic abilities and illusions.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Denizen of the Dark
entries: While in darkness, the duergar is {@condition invisible} to creatures that rely on darkvision to see.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, or 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage while enlarged.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage while enlarged.
Reaction

action.name: Ancestral Rage
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a magic or psionic effect, the duergar flies into a rage for the next minute, magically increasing its size to Large. While enraged in this way, the duergar doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Venomlink Aura
entries: A Drow, Drider, Spider, or Ettercap that starts its turn within 60 feet of the drow does an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage with each of its attacks, and its attacks have advantage against {@condition poisoned} creatures.

action.name: Wrack
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) necrotic damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature's movement speed is halved.

action.name: Charnel Haze (concentration)
entries: A cloud of viscous black fog spreads from a point within 60 feet to fill a 20-foot-radius sphere for the next minute. The fog is difficult terrain and heavily obscures the area, though the drow matron's vision is not impaired by it. The drow may target creatures in or adjacent to the fog with her Wrack ability as though they were within 5 feet of her.

action.name: Tide of Dreams {@recharge 5}
entries: The drow sends a wave of soporific magic out in a 60 foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep until the end of the drow's next turn, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to wake the sleeper. A {@condition poisoned} creature makes this save at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Hazy Escape
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a harmful spell, the drow teleports to an unoccupied space within its Charnel Haze. If it is no longer a valid target for the spell, the spell fails.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Cloak of Spiders
entries: The drow is surrounded by a swarm of venemous spiders. A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the drow must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. If this damage causes a creature to make a concentration check, the creature makes it at disadvantage.

action.name: Fangblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage. This attack has advantage against a {@condition poisoned} creature.

action.name: Lolth's Favor {@recharge 5}
entries: A willing drow, or one that died since the end of the Arachnomancer's last turn, within 60 feet explodes in a torrent of venemous spiders. Each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@dice 3d6}) piercing plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

reaction.name: Painbond
entries: As a reaction to seeing an allied drow, drider, spider, or ettercap within 60 feet take damage, the drow may cause a second such creature to take the damage instead.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Excruciating Stab
entries: If the drow deals 20 or more damage with a single attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the drow's next turn.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Whirlwind {@recharge 5}
entries: The drow makes a Scimitar attack against each creature in range.

reaction.name: Counterattack
entries: The drow adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. If this causes the attack to miss, the drow may make a scimitar attack as part of this reaction.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Brace of Daggers
entries: The drow has twelve daggers.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drow makes two attacks, or three attacks if it is in darkness.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Dousing Gloom
entries: Magical shadows spread from a point within 60 feet to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. Magical lights of 1st level or below in the area are extinguished, and nonmagical lights in the area produce only dim light. If the drow is hidden, this action does not reveal its position.

reaction.name: Shadowy Dodge
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the drow may halve the attack's damage if it's in dim light or darkness.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Dirty Fighting
entries: Attacks the drow makes at advantage deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Darkfire Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target is wreathed in writhing shadows for the next minute. As long as the creature is in dim light or darkness, attacks against it are made at advantage and the creature can't benefit from invisibility.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Swamp Dweller
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water, and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Rancid Air
entries: A creature that receives magical healing within 5 feet of one or more bullywugs must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Necessary Sacrifices
entries: If the bullywug damages an ally with either its Electric Reflux or its Fiery Croak, it may immediately roll to recharge its Electrical Reflux.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Mud Lord makes three attacks with its notched cudgel.

action.name: Notched Cudgel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Fiery Croak
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@dice 3d6}) thunder and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Fire damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or take half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Electric Reflux {@recharge 5}
entries: The bullywug retches a globule of electrochemical mucous that splashes over a 10 ft. radius within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage and be unable to take reactions until the start of its next turn, or take half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Swamp Dweller
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water, and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Frog Rider
entries: While riding a Large or larger frog, the bullywug acts on its mount's initiative, rather than rolling its own, and it has advantage on attack rolls against creatures smaller than its mount.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bullywug makes two attacks with its waterlogged lance.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Waterlogged Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is mounted, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a natural 1, this weapon shatters and the bullywug is knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Berate
entries: As a reaction to an allied creature within 30 ft. missing with an attack, the bullywug berates the ally. Each other
ally of the noble's that can hear and understand it has advantage on the first attack it makes in the next minute.

trait.name: Swamp Dweller
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water, and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Rancid Air
entries: A creature that receives magical healing within 5 feet of one or more bullywugs must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Foul Croak
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@dice 2d6}) thunder and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Bweeie Bw Bwe
entries: A foul miasma boils from the ground around the bullywug in a 20 ft. radius. Until the end of the bullywug's next turn, each creature with the Swamp Dweller trait that starts its turn in the area adds 2 ({@dice 1d4}) to their attack rolls, and each creature without the trait that starts its turn in the area subtracts 2 ({@dice 1d4}) from its attack rolls.

action.name: Brekekekex, Koax, Koax {@recharge 5}
entries: The earth around the bullywug shudders and shifts in a 20 ft. radius, turning any difficult terrain hazardous. A creature not native to a swamp that starts its turn in difficult terrain in the area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 13}).

trait.name: Swamp Dweller
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water, and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Spasmodic Hop
entries: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start. It has advantage on attacks against creatures it started its turn at least 15 ft. away from.

trait.name: Rancid Air
entries: A creature that receives magical healing within 5 feet of one or more bullywugs must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bullywug makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Foul Croak {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) thunder and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

reaction.name: Hyperextended Flailing
entries: As a reaction to a creature making an attack of opportunity against it, the bullywug makes a kick attack against the attacker.

trait.name: Swamp Dweller
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water, and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Rancid Air
entries: A creature that receives magical healing within 5 feet of one or more bullywugs must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Foul Croak {@recharge}
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) thunder and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Predatory Eye
entries: The bugbear has advantage on attack rolls against creatures with no adjacent allies.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Raid Leader
entries: Friendly bugbears witin 30 ft. may use the raid leader's attack bonus instead of their own.

trait.name: Birdcall Coordination
entries: The bugbear and its allies can communicate simple ideas over up to 120 ft. without alerting enemies to their presence. On the first turn of combat, each bugbear within 60 ft of the chieftian may act on the highest initiative rolled among them, rather than on their own.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two attacks with its machete and uses its fade away, if available.

action.name: Machete
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack was made with advantage, the target begins to bleed. At the beginning of each of its turns, an affected creature must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, losing {@dice 1d4} hit points on a failure, or ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Fade Away {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to three friendly bugbears within 60 may each use their reactions to move up to half their speed and take the Hide action.

trait.name: Predatory Eye
entries: The bugbear has advantage on attack rolls against creatures with no adjacent allies.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Trapdoor Tunneler
entries: The bugbear leaves a 5-ft.-diameter tunnel in its wake while burrowing. Over the course of an hour, the bugbear can construct a trapdoor of vegetation and debris that makes an opening up to 5 ft. across indistinguishable from natural terrain.. Creatures using the tunnels to hide gain advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two attacks with its skullthumper.

action.name: Skullthumper
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack was made with advantage, the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution Saving Throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and unable to stand on its next turn.

action.name: Collapse Tunnel (1/Day)
entries: The bugbear causes up to 20 ft. of a 5 ft. diameter tunnel within 20 ft. to collapse. Creatures inside the collapsed portion are {@condition blinded}, {@condition restrained}, and cannot speak or breathe. As an action, a creature may attempt a {@dc 15} Strength (Athletics) check, clearing 5 ft. of the collapse and freeing any creatures in the cleared area on a success.

trait.name: Predatory Eye
entries: The bugbear has advantage on attack rolls against creatures with no adjacent allies.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Skilled Ambusher
entries: The bugbear can attempt to hide without concealment in natural environments as long as it has 1 minute to prepare.

action.name: Garotte
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, a creature is unable to speak or breathe. If the attack was made at advantage, the target immediately begins to suffocate.

action.name: Throttle
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the bugbear must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) slashing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Predatory Eye
entries: The bugbear has advantage on attack rolls against creatures with no adjacent allies.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Indistinct
entries: The thicket shura does not reveal its position automatically when it is hidden and makes a ranged attack. Instead, a creature must discover its position by succeeding on a {@dc 16} Perception (Wisdom) check as an action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two attacks with its bolas.

action.name: Bolas
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the attack was made at advantage, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity Saving Throw or have its movement speed halved until it takes an action to remove the bolas.

trait.name: Predatory Eye
entries: The bugbear has advantage on attack rolls against creatures with no adjacent allies.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Skullthumper
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack was made with advantage, the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution Saving Throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and unable to stand on its next turn.

action.name: Hand Axe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Predatory Eye
entries: The bugbear has advantage on attack rolls against creatures with no adjacent allies.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Vicious Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack scores a critical on an 19 or 20.

trait.name: Brittle Bones
entries: If the aarakocra starts its turn {@condition grappled}, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The aarakocra doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes three attacks with its shocking claw.

action.name: Shocking Claw
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is {@condition stunned} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Fury of the Storm {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 120 ft. that is flying is pushed up to 15 ft. in a direction of the aarakocra's choice. Then, each creature in a 10 ft. radius, 100 ft. high cylinder within 120 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Take Flight
entries: As a reaction to taking damage from a melee attack, the aarakocra moves up to half its fly speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Vicious Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack scores a critical on an 19 or 20.

trait.name: Brittle Bones
entries: If the aarakocra starts its turn {@condition grappled}, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes three attacks with its flight lance.

action.name: Flight Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is knocked {@condition prone} if it is a medium or smaller creature.

reaction.name: Take Flight
entries: As a reaction to taking damage from a melee attack, the aarakocra moves up to half its fly speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

resist.note: from weapons that aren't either silvered or named.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Illusory Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic the voice or appearance of any animal or humanoid it knows the name of. A creature can discern the nature of this illusion with a successful {@dc 18} Wisdom (Insight) check.

trait.name: Debt Keeper
entries: A creature that is indebted to the hag is psychically connected to it. The hag can telepathically communicate with it over any distance and can choose to perceive through its senses. Once per day, the hag can force an indebted creature to reroll an attack, ability check, or saving throw, taking the second result.

trait.name: Soultaker Coven
entries: Humanoid creatures within 100 miles of a coven of night hags feel drawn to the coven's location in times of desperation. While part of a coven, the hag's hellish portal does not close when a creature falls into it.

trait.name: Soporific Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the hag's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag, the hag can force it to succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep until it takes any damage, or until another creature uses its action to wake it. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to the effect for the next 24 hours.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the  saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the hag until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

trait.name: Legendary Soultaker (3/Day)
entries: If the hag fails a saving throw, it can choose to release one of the souls it has trapped in its soul bag. If it does, it succeeds instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Fiendish Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the creature has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

action.name: Hellish Portal {@recharge 5}
entries: The hag opens a rift to a hellish demplane, 10 ft. long and 5 ft. wide, on a surface within 60 ft. A creature standing in the rift's space when it appears or that enters it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dextery saving throw or fall {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space adjacent to the rift. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more falls in. If one or more creatures fall into the rift, the rift closes.

A creature that falls into the rift takes 31 ({@damage 9d6}) psychic damage, 31 ({@damage 9d6}) fire damage, and ages 31 ({@dice 9d6}) years, and is {@condition incapacitated} until the beginning of its next turn, when it reappears in the space it left. The aging Effect can be reversed with a {@spell Greater Restoration} spell.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
entries: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane, afflicting it with dreadful nightmares. If this contact persists for an hour, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or gain no benefit from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 ({@dice 2d10}).

If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was indebted to the hag, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

A creature that is wearing a silver protective talsiman, or one that has had a Protection From Good And Evil spell cast on it in the last 8 hours makes this save at advantage. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw by 5 or more awakes, dragging the hag into the waking world with it. The hag appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target, and cannot use its Etherealness ability for the next minute.

reaction.name: Offer Bargain
entries: As a reaction to a creature it can see  failing a saving throw, the hag grants it the ability to choose to succeed instead. A creature that does is Indebted to the hag.

reaction.name: True Magic
entries: As a reaction to a creature it can see wihthin 60 ft. casting a spell, the hag disrupts the magic. The spell fails, and the spell caster takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage per level of the spell and must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned}.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

resist.note: from attacks with weapons that aren't named

trait.name: Fey Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects imposed by a creature that does not know its name.

trait.name: Swampwalk
entries: The hag is unaffected by difficult terrain caused by swampy terrain or vegetation.

trait.name: Illusory Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic the voice or appearance of any animal or humanoid it has killed. A creature can discern the nature of these illusions with a successful {@dc 16} Wisdom (Insight) check.

trait.name: Glimmer of Hope
entries: Whenever one or more creatures the hag can see within 30 ft. succeed on a saving throw against a spell the hag controls, the hag gains 11 ({@dice 2d10}) temporary hit points.

trait.name: Earthdrinker Coven
entries: The earth within 10 miles of a coven of green hags gradually softens and becomes waterlogged over the course of a week. The roots of food crops begin to rot away, livestock sicken, and the area becomes difficult terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes two melee attacks, one of which she may replace with either her Hurl to Earth or her Grasping Muck.

action.name: Swampgift Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be cursed.
While cursed, a creature glows with a pale blue light, attracts biting insects, and swamp-dwelling creatures have advantage on attack rolls against the cursed creature.

action.name: Hurl to Earth
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be teleported 60 ft. in the air and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Grasping Muck
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 15}) as it begins to sink into the earth. A {@condition prone} creature has disadvantage on this saving throw. A creature already affected by this ability is additionally {@condition blinded} and unable to speak or breathe as it sinks fully beneath the surface.

action.name: Stagnant Miasma {@recharge 5}
entries: The ground in a 10 ft. radius within 60 ft. begins to bubble, exuding a cloud of toxic gas that remains for a minute, or until cleared with a strong breeze. A creature that starts its turn in the cloud must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Invisible Passage (Concentration)
entries: The hag magically turns {@condition invisible} until she attacks or casts a spell. While {@condition invisible}, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic.

reaction.name: Poisoned Cup
entries: As a reaction to a creature she can see within 30 ft. receiving a source of magical healing, the hag fouls the magic. The creature receives no healing and instead takes an equal amount of necrotic damage.

reaction.name: Hope to Despair
entries: When a creature that the hag can see within 30 ft. makes a saving throw against a spell the hag (or a member of her coven) cast, she may expend all temporary hit points from her Glimmer of Hope ability and subtract the number expended from the creature's saving throw.

entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects imposed by a creature that does not know its name.

trait.name: Swampwalk
entries: The hag is unaffected by difficult terrain caused by swampy terrain or vegetation.

resist.note: from attacks with weapons that aren't named

trait.name: Graystaff Magic
entries: The hag carries a graystaff, a length of gray wood that is a focus for her inner power. She can ride the staff as if it were a broom of flying. If the staff is lost or destroyed, the hag cannot use its rime burst and must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a bheur hag can use a graystaff.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The hag can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost her extra moment.

trait.name: Sapping Cold
entries: Each time a creature hits the bheur hag with a melee attack, it must expend one unexpended hit die. If it cannot, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end its next turn.

trait.name: Embrittle
entries: On a roll of 1 with a melee attack agains the hag, a weapon that isn't named shatters in the wielder's hands, dealing 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Wintergiver Coven
entries: The area within 50 miles of a coven of bheur hags drops 1 degree every hour until it reaches 10 degrees below the lowest natural winter temperature of the area. Creatures in the area without cold resistance or immunity subtract {@dice 1d4} from the result of saving throws they make.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag uses its Rime Burst or Maddening Feast. Then, if one or more creatures within 30 ft. are {@condition frightened}, it may use its Onset of Desperation or Curse of Paranoia.

action.name: Rime Burst (Greystaff only)
entries: The hag sends forth an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain, and a creatue that starts its turn in it or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Maddening Feast
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5ft., one incacitated or dead target. *Hit* 20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage and 36 ({@damage 8d8}) cold damage. Each creature of the hag's choice that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for a minute. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Onset of Desperation
entries: One {@condition frightened} creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the hag for the same duration. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature uses its action to feed on the nearest beast or humanoid corpse it can see within 30 ft., or to attack the nearest living humanoid or beast it can see if there are no corpses in range.

action.name: Curse of Paranoia
entries: Each {@condition frightened} creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. A cursed creature cannot target friendly creatures with spells. If the cursed creature is targeted with a spell by a friendly creature, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be unaffected by the spell.

reaction.name: Feed on Greed
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 60 ft. targeting itself with a spell, the bhuer hag changes the spell's target to itself.

reaction.name: Chill the Weave
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 60 ft targeting the hag with a spell, the hag forces the caster to expend an additonal spell slot of the same or higher level. If it cannot, the hag chooses a new target for the spell.

trait.name: Graystaff Magic
entries: The hag carries a graystaff, a length of gray wood that is a focus for her inner power. She can ride the staff as if it were a broom of flying. Each creature of the hag's choice that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for a minute. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Curse of Paranoia
entries: One {@condition frightened} creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. A cursed creature cannot target friendly creatures with spells. If the cursed creature is targeted with a spell by a friendly creature, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be unaffected by the spell.

entries: As a reaction to a creature within 60 ft. targeting itself with a spell, the bhuer hag changes the spell's target to itself.
