entries: The fire giant makes two attacks with its searing greatsword. It may replace one of these attacks with an Overhead Cleave

action.name: Searing Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) slashing damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away. If the target is on fire, this attack does an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save.

action.name: Overhead Cleave {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot long, 10 foot wide line that isn't climbing on the giant must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) slashing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half damage on a success. A creature that passes this save may use its reaction to move 5 feet, taking no damage if it ends this movement outside the affected area.

action.name: Iron Javelins
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}41 ({@damage 10d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Battering Blows
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 81 HP, the fire giant may make a greatsword attack against each creature in range.

trait.name: Current Sense
entries: The giant's vision is not obscured by fog or clouds.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the giant may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 20} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the giant. While climbing on the giant, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the giant, and the giant has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

trait.name: Topple
entries: As an action, a creature climbing on the giant may attempt a {@dc 20} Strength (Athletics) check to topple it. On a success the giant is knocked {@condition prone} and must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two morningstar attacks. It may replace one morningstar attack with a use of its cloud sweep.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the creature is pushed 10 feet away. A creature that is levitating takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage and is instead pushed up to 30 feet. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save.

action.name: Cloud Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 30 foot cone must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 3d10}) bludgeoning damage and be levitated 10 feet in the air until the end of the giant's next turn. An affected creature can move only by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows it to move as if it were climbing.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Bleed Fog
entries: As a reaction to taking 15 or more damage from a single source, the cloud giant may shroud itself fog, becoming heavily obscured until the end of its next turn or until it moves.

trait.name: Evil Eye
entries: When a creature that can see the fomorian starts its turn within 30 feet of the fomorian, the fomorian can force it to make a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature subtracts {@dice 1d4} from any attacks or saving throws it makes until the beginning of its next turn. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the fomorian until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the giant may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 17} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the giant. While climbing on the giant, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the giant, and the giant has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fomorian makes two greatclub attacks. It may replace one gratclub attack with a use of its Share Curse ability.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save.

action.name: Giant Bolas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Share Curse {@recharge 5}
entries: The fomorian magically forces a creature affected by its evil eye to make a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw. The creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also cursed with magical deformities. While deformed, the creature has its speed halved and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Strength or Dexterity.

reaction.name: Wrack
entries: As a reaction being hit with an attack by a creature affected by its evil eye, the fomorian may force the attacker to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 4d6} psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the Fomorian's next turn.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Double Actions
entries: The ettin rolls initiative twice, and acts on each of them.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ettin uses its Rage song and makes one melee weapon attack.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Rage Song
entries: Until the end of its next turn, melee weapon attacks made by all creatures within 30 feet deal an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage. Melee weapon attacks made by non-giant creatures in the area are made at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Kick Away
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 feet of the ettin, the ettin forces it to succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away and lose concentration, if it was holding it.

reaction.name: Invoke Fury
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with an attack by a creature affected by its Rage Song, the ettin forces the attacker to make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a different target or lose the attack. If the creature fails this saving throw by 5 or more, the ettin chooses the new target.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Double Actions
entries: The ettin rolls initiative twice, and acts on each of them.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away.

reaction.name: Kick Away
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 feet of the ettin, the ettin forces it to succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away and lose concentration, if it was holding it.

reaction.name: Lash Out
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a magical effect, the ettin may move up to half its movement toward the spell caster. If it ends this movement with the spell's caster within its reach, it may then make an attack against the spell's caster.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away. Attacks against the cyclops made from more than 30 feet away are made at advantage.

trait.name: Evil Eye
entries: When a creature that can see the cyclops' eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops can force it to make a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature subtracts {@dice 1d4} from any attacks or saving throws it makes until the beginning of its next turn. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the cyclops until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two greataxe attacks. It may replace one gratclub attack with a use of its Tremor Smash ability.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 feet away. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save.

action.name: Cleaving Sweep
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot radius must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 4d12}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 feet away. A creature may fall {@condition prone} as a reaction to gain advantage on this save.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Kick Away
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops forces it to succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}, pushed 10 feet away, and lose concentration if it was holding it.

reaction.name: Harness Misfortune (Recharge 5-6)
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a spell, the cyclops may change the target to a creature affected with its evil eye.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away. Attacks against the cyclops made from more than 30 feet away are made at advantage.

trait.name: Evil Eye
entries: When a creature that can see the cyclops' eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops can force it to make a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature subtracts {@dice 1d4} from any attacks or saving throws it makes until the beginning of its next turn. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the cyclops until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks. It may replace one gratclub attack with a use of its Tremor Smash ability.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save.

action.name: Tremor Smash
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot cone must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 3d12}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 feet away. A creature may fall {@condition prone} as a reaction to gain advantage on this save.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Kick Away
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops forces it to succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}, be pushed 10 feet away, and lose concentration if it was holding it.

monster.name: Swarm of Vargouilles
languages: understands Abyssal Common and Infernal but is unable to speak

trait.name: Screeching Flock
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 ft. of the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

trait.name: Poor Vision
entries: The swarm has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. As an action, a creature may attempt a {@dc 8} Charisma (Deception) check to convince the swarm that something inedible is edible.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a small creature. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Locking Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 16 ({@dice 4d6 + 2}) piercing plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage, or 9 ({@dice 2d6 + 2}) piercing plus 10 ({@dice 3d6}) poison  if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, and the swarm attaches to the target. While attached, the swarm can't attack another target, and must use  an action or bonus action to free itself.

action.name: Manic Shrieking {@recharge 5}
entries: The swarm unleashes a cacaphony of piercing shrieks. Each creature within 20 ft. that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition stunned} until the end of the Vargouille's next turn. A {@condition frightened} creature makes this save at disadvantage.

bonus.name: Cursed Kiss
entries: One {@condition incapacitated} creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or be Cursed. While cursed in this way, a creature loses 1 point of Charisma for each hour it spends in dim light or darkness. A creature that has its Charisma reduced to 0 in this way has its head tear free of its body and sprout wings, becoming a vargouille.

monster.name: Vargouille
languages: and any languages it new before becoming a fiend

trait.name: Screeching Flock
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 ft. of three or more vargouilles must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

trait.name: Poor Vision
entries: The swarm has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. As an action, a creature may attempt a {@dc 8} Charisma (Deception) check to convince the vargouille that something inedible is edible.

action.name: Locking Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2}) plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and the vargouille attaches to the target. While attached, the vargouille can't attack another target, and must use  an action to free itself.

action.name: Cursed Kiss
entries: One {@condition incapacitated} creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be Cursed. While cursed in this way, a creature loses 1 point of Charisma for each hour it spends in dim light or darkness. A creature that has its Charisma reduced to 0 in this way has its head tear free of its body and sprout wings, becoming a vargouille.

action.name: Manic Shrieking {@recharge 5}
entries: The vargouille unleashes a piercing shriek. Each creature in a 15 ft. cone that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition stunned} until the end of the Vargouille's next turn. A {@condition frightened} creature makes this save at disadvantage.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition charmed}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Slink Away
entries: While it has fewer than 33 hit points, the fiend can disengage or hide as a bonus action.

action.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage and the target makes Wisdom saving throws at disadvantage until the end of the fiend's next turn.

action.name: Compel
entries: The fiend compels one creature {@condition charmed} by it to move up to half its speed and make a single weapon attack as a reaction.

action.name: Charm (Concentration)
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. When the fiend's charm ends on a creature, the target takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) psychic damage and is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition charmed} by it or a willing creature. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend two hit dice. A creature that cannot do so instead falls fully under the fiend's sway, and the fiend no longer requires concentration to dominate it.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the shoosuva reduces a creature to 0 hit points on its turn, the shoosuva can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Opportunist
entries: The shoosuva has advantage on attack rolls against a creature unless that creature hit it with a melee attack since the end of the shoosuva's last turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shoosuva makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail stinger.

action.name: Latching Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for the next minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Crush Bones
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the shoosuva takes 52 ({@damage 8d12}) piercing damage and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws that use Strength until it completes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Abyssal Cackle
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the shoosuva moves up to 20 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity, emitting an maddening laugh. The attacker and each other creature within 10 ft. of the it must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. Each creature (other than shoosuvas, gnolls, or hyenas) that failed the save must move up to half its speed and make a melee attack against the nearest creature (or against itself if there are no other creatures in range), starting with the attacker and progressing in initiative order.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The shadow mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Light Dependance
entries: While in darkness, the shadow mastiff is {@condition invisible} and has a 50 ft. climb speed. While in bright light, attack rolls against the shadow have advantage.

action.name: Multiattack (Darkness only)
entries: The shadow mastiff makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the shadow mastiff can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry (Dim light or darkness only)
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the shadow mastiff and at least one of the shadow mastiff's allies must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 9d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Bay (Recharge 5-6)
entries: As a reaction to being illuminated by a source of bright light for the first time this turn, the shadow mastiff lets out a terrifying prolonged howl. Each creature within 60 ft. that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the hound for the next minute and drop what it's holding. Any light sources dropped in this way are extinguished. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rakshasa makes two Claw attacks, uses its Fiendish Insight and uses its Master of Appearances. It may replace one claw attack with a {@condition poisoned} Dagger attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and the target is cursed if it is a creature. While cursed, the target can't regain hit points. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic.

action.name: Poisoned Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution Saving Throw or suffer 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Fiendish Insight
entries: 60 ft. range, 1 target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma Saving Throw. On a failure, the Rakshasa discovers what the target intends to do in the next six seconds.

action.name: Plane Shift (7th level spell, 1/day)
entries: The Rakshasa and up to eight willing creatures within 10 feet teleport to another plane of existence.

action.name: Master of Appearances
entries: The Rakshasa may assume the appearance of any humanoid creature, or become {@condition invisible}. If it becomes {@condition invisible}, an illusory duplicate of it is left in its place as it disappears. The duplicate disappears when any creature interacts with it. This effect ends when the Rakshasa takes an action other than to dash or disengage.

reaction.name: Saw it Coming
entries: At the end of any creature's turn, the Rakshasa can take a full turn as a reaction. If it does, it takes no actions on its next turn.

reaction.name: Alone
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 feet of the Rakshasa, the Rakshasa may throw a fistful of red powder in its eyes. The target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom Saving Throw or lose the ability to distinguish friend from foe for the next minute. The creature repeats this save at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success. A creature that keeps its eyes shut on its turn is immune to this effect.

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rakshasa makes two Claw attacks and uses its Fiendish Insight. It may replace one claw attack with a {@condition poisoned} Dagger attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage, and the target is cursed if it is a creature. The magical curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic.

action.name: Poisoned Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution Saving Throw or suffer 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Fiendish Insight
entries: 60 ft. range, 1 target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma Saving Throw. On a failure, the Rakshasa discovers what the target intends to do in the next six seconds.

action.name: Plane Shift (7th level spell, 1/day)
entries: The Rakshasa and up to eight willing creatures within 10 feet teleport to another plane of existence.

action.name: Master of Appearances
entries: The Rakshasa may assume the appearance of any humanoid creature, or become {@condition invisible}. This effect ends when the Rakshasa takes an action other than to dash or disengage.

reaction.name: Saw it Coming
entries: At the end of any creature's turn, the Rakshasa can take a full turn as a reaction. If it does, it takes no actions on its next turn.

reaction.name: Alone (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 feet of the Rakshasa, the Rakshasa may throw a fistful of red powder in its eyes. The target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom Saving Throw or lose the ability to distinguish friend from foe for the next minute. The creature repeats this save at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success. A creature that keeps its eyes shut on its turn is immune to this effect.

monster.name: Nightmare
languages: Common and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and the target is pushed back 10 feet.

action.name: Burning Trail
entries: The nightmare moves up to 60 feet in a straight line. Each creature in its path must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}, or move 5 feet out of the affected area on a success. Until the beginnning of the nightmare's next turen, a creature that starts its turn in the affected area or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Ethereal Stride
entries: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

reaction.name: Offer Service
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 17 HP, the nightmare may kneel and offer its service to a creature. If the creature accepts, the nightmare becomes friendly toward it and follows its commands.

reaction.name: Burn Out
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 17 HP, the nightmare may explode. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The Howler has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Howler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Howler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Quill Defense
entries: Any creature that strikes a howler with a non-reach melee weapon, unarmed strike, or natural weapon takes {@dice 1d4} points of piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The howler makes two attacks with its rending bite.

action.name: Rending Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage, plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage if the target is {@condition frightened}. This attack ignores damage resistance.

action.name: Cursed Quills
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC16 Dexterity save or a cursed quill breaks off in its flesh, causing the target to subtract {@dice 1d4} from the result whenever it makes an attack or save. The quills may be removed as an action with a successful DC16 medicine check, or by taking an additional {@damage 1d6} damage per quill removed.

action.name: Mind-Breaking Howl {@recharge}
entries: The howler emits a keening howl in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area that isn't {@condition deafened} must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the howler's next turn. While a creature is {@condition frightened} in this way, its speed is halved, and it is {@condition incapacitated}. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Mind-Breaking Howl of all howlers for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Present Quills
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the porcupine may make an attack with its cursed quills.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: Le loup a un avantage sur les tests de Sagesse (Perception) qui reposent sur l'ouïe ou l'odorat.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Le loup a l'avantage sur les jets d'attaque contre une créature si au moins un allié du loup se trouve à moins de 1,5 mètre de la créature et que l'allié ne l'est pas {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Predatory Bearing
entries: A creature that starts its turn with no adjacent allies and that can see the wolf must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire damge and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the hell hound and at least one of the hell hound's allies must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 24 ({@damage 7d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.

trait.name: Liar's Insight
entries: The cambion knows if it hears a lie.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice. It may replace one of its attacks with a use of its Soulscorch, if available.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Hellfire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Soulscorch {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 feet that the cambion can see must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and begin to burn, or half damage on a success. A burning creature repeats this saving throw at the end of their turn, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failure, or ending the condition on a success.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid the cambion can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke (1st level spell)
entries: As a reaction to being damaged by a creature, the cambion may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The barghest can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Small goblin or back into its true form. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The barghest reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Fire Banishment
entries: The barghest treats any areas of open flames at least 10 feet wide as one-way portals to Gehenna. A barghest that starts its turn in a burning area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be drawn through.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the barghest moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the barghest can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The barghest makes two claw attacks and uses its teleport.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the barghest can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the barghest and at least one of the barghest's allies must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Teleport (spell, 4th level)
entries: The barghest and up to one creature that is riding it or {@condition grappled} by it magically teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yagnoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A yagnoloth will usually accept a rate of its challenge rating times 25 gp, or half as much for a creature willing to pledge a future service.

trait.name: Electrified Flesh
entries: A creature that hits the yugoloth with a melee attack can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yagnoloth uses two of its actions. It may not use the same action twice in a turn.

action.name: Battlefield Cunning
entries: One allied yugoloth within 60 feet of the yagnoloth that can hear it can use its reaction to make one melee attack.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (3rd level spell)
entries: Creatures in a 100 ft. long, 5 ft. wide line must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Massive Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and unable to stand until the end of the yagnoloth's next turn.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: The yagnoloth magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single source, the yagnoloth may shroud itself in a 20 foot radius cloud of magical darkness until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Steal Life
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the yagnoloth may force the spell caster to make a {@dc 16} Charisma Saving Throw. On a failed save, the spell caster is teleported to within 5 feet of the yagnoloth, takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage and expends two hit die. If the spell caster cannot do so, it drops to 0 HP instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yagnoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. An oinoloth will usually accept a rate of its challenge rating times 25 gp, or half as much for a creature willing to pledge a future service.

trait.name: Bringer of Plagues
entries: The Oinoloth is immune to the effects of disease. A creature that starts its turn within 30 ft. of the oinoloth must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be infected with {@disease wastegash|ConfC}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oinoloth makes two claw attacks and uses its Teleport or its Transfixing Gaze, if available.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Teleport (spell, 3rd level)
entries: The yagnoloth magically teleports up to 60 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Transfixing Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that is infected with wasterot must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the oinoloth for the next minute, or until its disease is cured. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target does its best to follow the commands of the oinoloth, and repeats this save whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Wall of Vermin (1/Day)
entries: The oinoloth summons a wall of writhing vermin on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall counts as difficult terrrain, is 5 ft. thick and comprised of six contiguous segments each up to 10 feet long and 10 feet high. A creature that begins its turn in the wall or enters it for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is infected with {@disease filth fever|ConfC}.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single source, the oinoloth may shroud itself in a 20 foot radius cloud of magical darkness until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Corrupted Healing
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 30 ft. reciving magical healing, the oinoloth forces the creature to make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. A creature infected with a disease makes this save at disadvantage. On a failure, the creature has vulnerability to all damage for the next minute, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A yugoloth will usually accept a rate of the yugoloth's challenge rating times 25 gp, though it may accept less.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The nycaloth can't be affected or detected by spells of 3rd level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The nycaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nycaloth makes a claw attack and uses its teleport, or it makes a greataxe attack and uses its invisibility.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or lose half its current HP. A creature that fails this save repeats it at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success or losing half its current HP on a failure.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The Nycaloth magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

action.name: Teleport
entries: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any creatures it is grappling, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The mezzoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A yugoloth will usually accept a rate of the yugoloth's challenge rating times 25 gp, though it may accept less.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mezzoloth makes four attacks: one with its toxic spittle and three with its trident.

action.name: Dweomerend Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target has any spells of fourth level or below it is affected by dispelled. If a spell is dispelled in this way, the target takes an additional {@damage 1d8} force damage per level of the spell.

action.name: Toxic Spittle {@recharge 5}
entries: Target creature within 15 feet must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) poison damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Legendary Reactions
entries: The mezzoloth may make a legendary reaction whenever its conditions are met, without using its reaction.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: As a reaction to taking 15 or more damage from a single source, the Mezzoloth may shroud itself in a 20 foot radius cloud of magical darkness until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Trident Trip
entries: As a reaction to a creature missing it with a melee attack, the mezoloth may force it to make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Swift Vengeance
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the mezzoloth teleports up to 60 feet. If it ends this teleportation within 5 feet of the spellcaster, the mezzoloth may make an attack with its trident.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The mezzoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A yugoloth will usually accept a rate of the yugoloth's challenge rating times 25 gp, though it may accept less.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mezzoloth makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its trident. It may replace its claw attack with a use of its Toxic Spittle ability.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

action.name: Toxic Spittle {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 15 feet must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) poison damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single source, the Mezzoloth may shroud itself in a 20 foot radius cloud of magical darkness until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The merrenoloth charges a rate of 100 gp per passenger for passage on its boat, or 1000 gp for a passenger that has wronged it or another merrenoloth.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merrenoloth makes two attacks with its oar and uses its Fear Gaze.

action.name: Oar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Drowning Gaze
entries: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the merrenoloth for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature cannot swim or hold its breath. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Teleport
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with its boat and whichever occupants of the boat it chooses, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Adaptive Combat
entries: The hydroloth treats its AC as 20 against attacks made by creatures affected by its Steal Memories.

trait.name: Secure Memory
entries: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A yugoloth will usually accept a rate of its challenge rating times 25 gp.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydroloth attacks twice with its claws and uses its Steal Memories, if available. It may replace either or both of its claw attacks with its Deepest Fears or Teleport abilities.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Deepest Fears
entries: One creature affected by the hydroloth's Steal Memories has a manifestation of its deepest fears appear to it for the next minute. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} for the duration. A creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a succcess or taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage on a failure.

action.name: Steal Memories {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature the hydroloth can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or have its proficiency bonus reduced by 1 until it completes a long rest. A creature that has its proficiency bonus reduced to 0 in this way can't speak or cast spells.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: The hydroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Shared Mind
entries: As a reaction to failing an Intelligence or Wisdom saving throw, the hydroloth may force a creature within 60 feet that is affected by its Steal Memory to succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or suffering the triggering saving throw's effects as well.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dhergoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Confusing Anatomy
entries: A creature gains no benefit from flanking the dhergoloth. If the dhergoloth falls {@condition prone}, it must spend its action to stand up.

trait.name: Gyroscopic
entries: If the dhergoloth makes four or more claw attacks in a turn, it has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A dhergoloth will usually accept a rate of its challenge rating times 25 gp, or half as much from a creature proficient in Intimidation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dhergoloth makes three flailing claw attacks, plus an additional flailing claw attack for each successive turn it uses this ability, to a maximum of six. If it makes five or more flailing claw attacks in a turn, it also uses its Shriek.

action.name: Flailing Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Shriek
entries: Each creature within 15 feet of the Dhergoloth must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of it until the end of the Dhergoloth's next turn.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: The dhergoloth magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single source, the Dhergoloth may shroud itself in a 20 foot radius cloud of magical darkness until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Dimensional Lock
entries: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted. Creatures in the area have resistance to Force damage.

trait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, dragging, or being ridden by another creature, the canoloth is considered to be Large.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The canoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Barbed Tongue
entries: A creature that starts its turn {@condition grappled} by the canoloth takes 13 ({@damage 2d12}) piercing damage. The tongue can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points). Destroying the tongue deals no damage to the canoloth, which can extrude more tongue on its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The canoloth makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}), and is {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The canoloth can grapple one target at a time with its tongue.

reaction.name: Reel
entries: As a reaction to a creature damaging its tongue or failing an attempt to escape its grapple, the canoloth may force a creature {@condition grappled} by it to succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and pulled 30 feet towards the canoloth.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The arcanaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A yugoloth will usually accept a rate of the yugoloth's challenge rating times 25 gp, though it may accept less.

trait.name: Spell Trader
entries: The arcanaloth knows all wizard spells of 8th level or lower. If it fears it will lose a fight, it may offer to teach a creature with a spellbook one spell in exchange for mercy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arcanaloth uses its arcane insight once and its magic barrage twice. It may replace one use of its magic barrage with a use of its Steal Spell, if available.

action.name: Arcane Insight
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must make a {@dc 17} Charisma Saving Throw. On a failure, the Arcanaloth discovers what spells the target has prepared and what unexpended spell slots they have.

action.name: Magic Barrage
entries: The arcanaloth unleashes a swarm of magical missiles that strike a creature within 120 feet, dealing 27 ({@damage 5d8 + 5}) force damage. A creature may halve this damage with the {@spell Shield} spell.

action.name: Steal Spell {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 feet must make a {@dc 17} Charisma save. On a failed save, the Arcanaloth casts a spell the creature has prepared, expending one of the creature's spell slots to do so. For the next minute, the creature cannot cast that spell.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage. The target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Invisibility (2nd level spell)
entries: The Arcanaloth becomes {@condition invisible} until it takes another action.

reaction.name: Trickster's Escape
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with an attack or spell, the Arcanaloth may force a small or medium creature within 60 feet to succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or switch places with the arcanaloth, becoming the new target.

reaction.name: Shield (1st level spell)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the Arcanaloth increases its AC by 5, including against the triggering attack, until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Counterspell (3rd level spell)
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature within 60 feet cast a spell, the yugoloth may attempt to disrupt it, making an Intelligence ability check with DC equal to 10+ the spells level. This check succeeds automatically if the spell is 3rd level or below.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Limited Spines
entries: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest. If the devil has no spines remaining, it may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks with its tail spines.

action.name: Fork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/80 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage and the spine embeds in the target's flesh. The target's speed is reduced by 5 ft. for each spine embedded in it. The spines may be removed as an action with a successful DC12 medicine check, or by taking an additional {@damage 1d6} damage per spine removed.

action.name: Detonate Spines
entries: Each creature with one or more of the devil's spines lodged in it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage per spine, after which the spines crumble to ash.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Heart Crusher
entries: The pit fiend's attacks score a critical on a roll of  16-20 against a {@condition frightened} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pit fiend makes four attacks: one with its bite, one with its claw, one with its mace, and one with its tail. It may replace its bite attack with a use of its irresistable command.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 21 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is knocked back 10 feet.

action.name: Irresistable Command
entries: The pit fiend forces one friendly devil of CR 19 or below to move up to 25 feet and then explode. Each creature within 20 feet of the devil must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a success. The devil that explodes is killed.

reaction.name: Call the Legions
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 150 HP, the Pit Fiend summons four Merregons. A summoned devil appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner and remains for 1 minute or until it or its summoner dies. Each creature adjacent to a summoned devil when it appears must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that arent silvered

trait.name: Cloud of Vermin
entries: A non-devil creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo must succeed on a DC11 Constitution saving throw or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage and be infected with {@disease pthisis|ConfC}. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage.

trait.name: Scent-Reliant
entries: The nupperibo is blind in the presence of an overpowering scent, such as that produced by the {@spell Stinking Cloud} spell.

trait.name: Weak-Minded
entries: The nupperibo follows the most recent telepathic command it was given, if it understands it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) dégâts perforants.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that arent silvered

trait.name: Infernal Tack
entries: The Narzugon may mount any willing Large or larger creature. While riding a creature, the narzugon acts on its mount's initiative, rather than rolling its own.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Aura of Relentless Command
entries: A devil that starts its turn within 60 feet of the narzugon makes saving throws to end an ongoing effect at the beginning of its turn, rather than at the end.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The narzugon uses either its Compel Honor or Abjure the Unforsaken, then makes three attacks with its hellfire lance.

action.name: Hellfire Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in {@dice 1d4} hours.

action.name: Compel Honor
entries: One creature within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed to face it in melee combat. An affected creature that attempts to target the narzugon with an attack or harmful spell from more than 10 feet away must first make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.

action.name: Abjure the Unforsaken
entries: One non-fiend creature within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature must spend its turn trying to move as far from the narzugon as it can.

action.name: Channel Death {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}90 ({@damage 20d8}) necrotic damage.

reaction.name: Punish Falsity
entries: As a reaction to a creature succeeding on a saving throw against the narzugon's Compel Honor ability, the narzugon and its mount may move up to it's (or its mount's) speed toward the creature. If it ends this movement within 10 ft. of the creature, the narzugon may make a hellfire lance attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that arent silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the merregon's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Trudging Advance
entries: The merregon acts on initiative count 5, instead of rolling initiative. Creatures with this trait share a turn, taking their actions and movement in any order.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merregon makes two halberd attacks, or if an allied fiend of challenge rating 6 or higher is within 60 feet of it, the merregon makes three halberd attacks. It may replace one of its halberd attacks with a use of its Steal Face, if available.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Steal Face {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution save or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage, or half as much on a success. A creature reduced to 0 HP by this damage has its face stolen by the merregon, as its features melt off and slide away leaving only blank flesh behind until cured with a Greater Restoration or equivalent magic. A faceless creature can still breath and speak, though it is difficult to tell how.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., climb 20 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Sting (Bite in Beast Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Phlegmatic Imbalance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet  must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be slowed. An affected creature's speed is halved, it takes a -2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. Regardless of the creature's abilities or magic items, it can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The imp magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

action.name: Melancholic Imbalance {@recharge 5}

action.name: Sanguine Imbalance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet  must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone}, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up for the duration as it is overcome with fits of uncontrolable laughter. At the end of each of its turns, and each time it takes damage, the target can repeat this save, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Diabolical Stench {@recharge 5}

action.name: Choleric Imbalance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving  throw or be cursed. Whenever a cursed creature takes damage, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or go into a berserker rage. While raging, the cursed creature must use its action to make a melee attack against the last creature to damage it, or to dash towards it. A creature may repeat this Wisdom save at the end of each of its turns, regaining control over itself on a success.

action.name: Wounding Curse {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. Whenever a cursed creature takes damage, it takes {@damage 1d4} additional damage of the same type.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The imp magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Ice Strider
entries: The devil can tunnel through ice without slowing. The devil is not slowed by difficult terrain due to ice or snow. If it starts its turn in difficult terrain caused by ice or snow, the devil may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Layered Carapace
entries: The Ice Devil can't take more than 30 damage in a single turn. If it takes 30 damage in a single turn, its AC takes a cumulative minus 2 penalty until it completes a long rest.

trait.name: Crippling Cold
entries: The devil is surrounded by an 15 ft. radius aura of magical cold. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage, or half as much damage on a success. If the Ice Devil does not move on its turn, the affected area is covered in slick ice and becomes difficult terrain. If the devil takes fire damage, this trait ceases to function until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks with its spear and uses its Ice Wall twice. If all three of its attacks hit the same creature, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the devil's next turn.

action.name: Barbed Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Ice Wall
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 10 feet long and 10 feet high. When the wall appears, creatures in its space are pushed to a side of their choice.
The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

action.name: Freezing Tomb {@recharge 5}
entries: The devil sends out a burst of cold in a 60-foot cone that clings to living creatures, sapping their vitality. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature gains 27 ({@dice 6d8}) temporary HP. As long as it has this temporary HP, the creature is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and has vulnerability to fire damage. A creature that starts its turn with any of this temporary HP must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend a hit die. If it cannot, it drops to 0 HP.

reaction.name: Cold Snap
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a ranged attack or harmful spell, the ice devil uses its Ice Wall ability. If the devil is no longer a valid target, the attack or spell fails.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Devilish Transposition
entries: At the start of each of its turn, the devil may switch positions with any medium or larger devil within 60 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame or Advance! in place of any of these, if available.

action.name: Wounding Fork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage and the target is dragged 5 feet toward the devil, or knocked {@condition prone} if it can't be. If this attack was made at advantage, the target suffers an infernal wound. A wounded creature loses 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points at the end of its turn for each wound it has. This effect ends when the target receives magical healing, or when a creature uses its action to stanch the wounds with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom (Medicine) check.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

action.name: Advance! {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to two devils CR 10 or below within 60 feet may each move up to half their speed and make a melee attack.

reaction.name: Besiege
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the devil may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed, granting all devils advanatage on attacks made against it until the end of the horned devil's next turn.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the erinyes may  transform into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in any form, and it reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the erinyes' choice).

trait.name: Corrupted Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the erinyes must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be

{@condition frightened} by the erinyes until the beginning of its next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also {@condition charmed} as long as it remains {@condition frightened}, and obeys the Erinyes' verbal commands. A creature succeeds automatically on this save if the Erinyes took hostile action against it since the end of the creature's last turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The erinyes makes three attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. The poison lasts until it is removed by the {@spell lesser restoration} spell or similar magic.

action.name: Imperil the Soul
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the Erinyes must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or take 77 ({@damage 14d10}) psychic damage. If this would reduce the creature to 0 hit points, it instead deals no damage, and the target is {@condition charmed} by the erinyes for as long as they remain on the same plane of existence.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Desecrating Presence
entries: Creatures of the devil's choice within 30 ft. of it subtract {@dice 1d4} from any saving throws they make.

trait.name: Retractable Claws
entries: As a bonus action, the devil may extend or reduce the reach of its claws by 5 ft., to a maximum of 15 ft.

trait.name: Befuddling Haze
entries: Creatures within 30 ft. of the devil have disadvantage on Insight, Investigation, and Perception skill checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks, each of which it may replace with a use of its corrupting imprecation.

action.name: Torment Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Corrupting Imprecation
entries: One creature within 120 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or suffer a Curse of Corruption for the next minute. At the beginning of each of a cursed creature's turns, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage, ending the effect on a success.

legendary.name: Desperate Measures
entries: One friendly devil or dominated creature within 30 ft. may use its reaction to make a melee attack against a creature in range. If the corruption devil has fewer than 169 hit points, each friendly devil and dominated creature in range may instead use its reaction to make a melee attack.

legendary.name: Sway the Corrupt
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that is afflicted with a Curse of Corruption must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or act under the devil's control until the end of its following turn.

legendary.name: Doom the Corrupt (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that is afflicted with a Curse of Corruption must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or have its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores each reduced by {@dice 1d4}, to a minimum of 1, until it completes a short or long rest.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Grasping Chains
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 ft. of the devil must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dextertiy saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Torturer
entries: A creature that fails a saving throw imposed by the devil may use its reaction to reveal a deep secret or weakness. If it does, it may reroll that saving throw, taking the second result.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks with its gorechain flail.

action.name: Gorechain Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). On a critical hit, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Flay Living
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the devil must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 55 ({@dice 10d10}) and begins to bleed, or takes half as much damage on a success. A bleeding creature repeats this saving throw at the beginning of each of its turns, losing 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points on a failure or ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Gorechain Takeover
entries: As a reaction to a creature {@condition grappled} by it making an attack or casting a spell, the devil changes the target of the attack to another valid target in range of its choice.

reaction.name: Chains of Vengeance (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 116 hit points, the chain devil makes two chain attacks.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Living Chains
entries: The chain devil has two chains, though it can control up to five through its Animate Chains ability. Each chain can be attacked (AC 20; 20 hit points; immunity to psychic and thunder damage). Destroying a chain deals no damage to the  devil.

trait.name: Unnerving Mask
entries: Beneath its chains and wounds, the devil always appears to be a deceased individual that has some significance to the observer.
