entries: The zmey makes as many bite attacks as it has heads. If it is grappling a creature at the start of its turn, it may replace one of its bite attacks with a swallow.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} pour toucher, portée de 10 ft, une cible. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dégâts perforants et la cible est {@condition grappled}. Lorsqu'une tête agrippe une cible, elle ne peut attaquer que cette cible.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The zmey makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition grappled} in the zmey's craw, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the zmey, and it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the zmey's turns. One swallowed creature is freed whenever the zmey loses a head.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by at least two zmey heads must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature makes this save at disadvantage if it is {@condition grappled} by three or more zmey heads.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The zmey exhales fire in a number of 60-foot long, 5-foot wide lines equal to the number of heads that it has. Each creature in one or more lines must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The wyvern doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger. While flying, it can use its claws in place of one other attack.

action.name: Rending Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is wearing leather or cloth armor, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10  is destroyed.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Pseudodragon
senses: the pseudodragon has advantage on wisdom (perception) checks that rely on sight
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak them

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Dweomer Attuned
entries: Spells of 3rd level or below with a duration of at least 1 minute that target only the pseudodragon instead have a duration of Until Dispelled.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

trait.name: Blood Scent
entries: The drake can pinpoint, by scent, the location of any creature within 120 ft. that does not have all of its hit points.

trait.name: Dweomer Chill
entries: A creature that casts a spell within 15 feet of the drake takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage per level of the spell. A creature that starts its turn in the area while concentrating on a spell must make a Concentration check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage. Instead of dealing damage, the drake can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the drake and at least one of the drake's allies must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Bluff Strike
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the drake's reach, it may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to immediately move 10 ft. away from the drake, if it can.

entries: The drake can pinpoint, by scent, the location of any creature within 120 ft. that does not have all of its hit points.

action.name: Spit Fire
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage and catch fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Bluff Strike
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the drake's reach, it may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to immediately move 10 ft. away from the drake, if it can.

entries: The drake can pinpoint, by scent, the location of any creature within 120 ft. that does not have all of its hit points.

trait.name: Fuming Blood
entries: Whenever the drake takes slashing or piercing damage, its blood reacts with the air to form a poisonous gas. Until the beginning of its next turn, a creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the drake takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poisond damage.

entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Spit Venom

trait.name: Electrified Flesh
entries: A creature that hits the drake with a melee attack can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage. Instead of dealing damage, the drake can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Acid damage, or half as much on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more has disadvantage on attack rolls while in sunlight for the next minute.

reaction.name: Bluff Strike
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the drake's reach, it may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to immediately move 10 ft. away from the drake, if it can.

trait.name: Godlike Resistance
entries: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead. If she does, she regains two fewer legendary action on her followihng turn.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Titanic Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to Tiamat may spend 30 feet of movement to attempt a {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto tiamat. While climbing on Tiamat, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against her, and she can make no more than one bite attack against that creature each turn.

trait.name: Multitrack Machinations
entries: Tiamat may concentrate on up to five spells simultaneously. She regains one fewer legendary action at the beginning of her turn for each spell she is concentrating on beyond the first. If she fails a concentration check, she loses concentration on all spells she is concentrating on.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tiamat can use her Maddening Presence. She then makes five attacks: four with her bite and one with her tail. She may replace all of her bite attacks with a use of her worry ability.

action.name: Pargaon Breath
entries: Tiamat exhales elemental energy in a 300-foot cone, or 300 foot long, 15 foot wide line (Tiamat's choice). Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity or Constitution saving throw (Tiamat's choice), taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The damage type is either Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison (Tiamat's choice).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. While a head grapples a target, the head can attack only that target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 25 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. Each creature within 20 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take half as much damage, be pushed back 10 feet and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by at least two of Tiamat's heads must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution throw or take 110 ({@damage 20d10}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature makes this save at disadvantage if it is {@condition grappled} by three or more of Tiamat's heads. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ripped in half and dies.

action.name: Maddening Presence
entries: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a DC: 26 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns, and must use its turn to either dash away or attempt to hide. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: Tiamat makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: Tiamat beats her wings. Each creature within 30 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Tiamat can then fly up to half its flying speed

legendary.name: Breath Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat uses her Paragon Breath ability.

legendary.name: Wish (9th level spell, Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Tiamat casts any spell of 8th level or below.

immune.special: one other type determined by the dragon's former type

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: Shadow Form
entries: The shadow dragon's traits change depending on lighting.
In darkness, the dragon treats all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)
In dim light or darkness it can hide as a bonus action without obscurement, submerging itself in pools of shadow.
In bright light, attacks against the dragon have advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. If the dragon is bright light, it may replace its tail attack with two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Shadow Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales writhing shadow in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 105 ({@damage 30d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature with a shadow reduced to 0 by this damage falls into its shadow, and its shadow climbs into the material plane to replace it, with the following attributes:
The creature's shadow has the same statistics and abilities as the creature and has one hit point. It acts on the dragon's initiative and is under the dragon's control.
The creature remains conscious, but may only target its shadow with spells and abilities.
A creature can wrestle the shadow back into the shadow realm with a successful {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. If it does, the creature returns to the material plane with one hit point.
If the creature's shadow receives any healing, the shadow is banished to the shadow realm. The creature returns to the material plane with one hit point.
If the creature's shadow dies, the creature is lost forever to the realm of shadow.

reaction.name: Snuff (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 369 HP, the dragon extinguishes all lights within 300 ft.

reaction.name: Shadow Glide (Dim light only)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the dragon may teleport up to 60 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until the beginning of its next turn.

legendary.name: Snatch
entries: The dragon makes a claw attack against a creature that it is hidden from. If the attack hits, the target is {@condition grappled}, {@condition stunned}, and hidden from its allies until the begining of its next turn. This attack does not automatically reveal the dragon's position.

legendary.name: Shadow Tether
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the dragon can see must make a {@dc 22} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the next time the dragon takes damage in the next minute, it takes half as much damage and the target takes the same amount.

legendary.name: Waken Shadows
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 22}) as its shadow lunges to grip it. A creature is freed if it is in bright light.

immune.special: one other type determined by the dragon's former type

entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the dragon may teleport up to 20 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Illusory Passage
entries: The dragon can move through natural and magical foliage as though it were illusory.

trait.name: Capricious Jest
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the dragon and attempts to move must first make a {@dc 21} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the dragon controls its movement this turn.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The dragon has an illusory double that mirrors its movements imperfectly, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn and the next attack against the dragon before the dragon's next turn has advantage.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the dragon may spend its full movement to attempt a {@dc 21} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the dragon. While climbing on the dragon, a creature is unaffected by its displacement trait.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 21}), and pulled up to 20 feet towards the dragon.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 300 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Derealization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an shimmering aurora of existential crises in a 300 ft. cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw, taking 98 ({@damage 28d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more becomes convinced that it is an illusion. An affected creature cannot concentrate on spells, loses concentration if it was holding it, and makes a {@dc 24} Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

action.name: Depersonalization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 300 ft. cone must make a {@dc 24} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the controlling player exchanges control of the creature with another player until the end of the dragon's next turn. At the beginning of an affected creatures turn, start a timer. The creature takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage for each 6 seconds the player takes to resolve its turn.

reaction.name: Out of Nowhere
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack while its Displacement is active, the dragon makes a tendril attack. If it hits, it may immediately us its Hurl ability as part of this reaction, and its Displacement trait is disabled until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 297 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Derealization Breath.

legendary.name: Slink
entries: The dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

legendary.name: Hurl
entries: The dragon throws a creature it has {@condition grappled} up to 30 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage, in addition to any damage from falling.

legendary.name: Disorienting Lurch (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon forces any number of creatures within 60 feet to succceed on a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw or be teleported 30 feet in a direction of the dragon's choice. Then, if the dragon is at least partially obscured, it may reactivate its Displacement trait, if currently inactive.

action.name: Hypothermic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of chilling gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition paralyzed} outside of its own turn, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more must use its action to doff its armor or shield.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 158 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Freezing Breath.

legendary.name: Shield the Weak
entries: The dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. If it ends that movement within 10 feet of a friendly creature, the creature gains +3 to its AC and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or until it moves further away.

legendary.name: Face Me!
entries: One creature within 30 feet is compelled to meet the dragon in melee combat. An affected creature that attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell from more than 10 feet away on its following turn must first make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature loses the attack or spell.

legendary.name: Cryostasis
entries: One creature that died within the last minute returns to life with 0 hit points and automatically stabilizes.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: Le dragon peut se déplacer sur des surfaces glacées et les escalader sans avoir besoin de faire un test d'aptitude. De plus, un terrain difficile composé de glace ou de neige ne lui coûte pas de mouvement supplémentaire.

trait.name: Flattery Vulnerability
entries: When subjected to flattery by a medium or smaller creature, the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the creature until it takes hostile action against the dragon or its allies. A dragon that succeeds on this save becomes immune to flattery from that creature for the next minute.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away from the dragon.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Freezing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Hypothermic Breath
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of chilling gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition paralyzed} outside of its own turn, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more must use its action to doff its armor or shield.

reaction.name: Shield the Weak
entries: As a reaction to a friendly creature it can see being targeted with an attack, the dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. If it ends that movement within 5 feet of the creature, the creature gains +2 to its AC (including against the triggering attack) and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or until it moves further away.

trait.name: Outshine the Eager
entries: At initiative count 20, the dragon may force one creature within 60 ft. that it can see to make a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the dragon trades initiatives with it.

trait.name: Jester's Fury
entries: Whenever one or more creatures within 60 ft. fail to laugh at a humorous comment or pun made by the dragon, it rolls to recharge its breath weapon.

trait.name: Acid Fumes
entries: A creature that starts its turn iwthin 10 ft. of the dragon takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It may replace one claw attack with a tail attack.

action.name: Acid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor or a nonmagical metal shield, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Aqua Regia Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in an 300-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 81 ({@damage 18d8}) acid damage and losing 20% of the gold and platinum it is carrying on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Unattended gold and platinum in the area dissolves entirely.

action.name: Slowing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

reaction.name: Heckler's Veto
entries: As a reaction to a creature it can see within 60 ft. casting a spell, the dragon forces the creature to make a {@dc 21} saving throw using the creature's spell casting ability. On a failed save, the spell fails.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 260 hit points, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: Banter
entries: The dragon offers a humorous comment or pun on an action a creature within 60 ft. took on its previous turn. The creature may use its reaction to reply with a humorous comment or salient pun of its own. If it does, both the creature and the dragon have advantage on the next attack or saving throw they make in the next minute. If it fails to do so, the creature has disadvantage on the next attack or saving throw it makes in the next minute.

legendary.name: False Wall
entries: The dragon raises an illusory wall of opaque stone, 20 ft. high and 20 ft. long, within 60 ft. A creature that attempts to pass through must succeed on a {@dc 21} Intelligence saving throw to do so. A creature that knows the wall is an illusion makes this save at advantage.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

variant.name: Note: Aqua Regia
entries: Aqua regia is a mix of hydrochloric acid and nitric acid that is notable for its ability to dissolve gold and platinum, while leaving silver intact. Real aqua regia does dissolve copper, but I think it's much more on-theme for a copper dragon to keep all its copper and silver in a big, easilly plunderable pile, while its gold and platinum is kept dissolved in massive pools of fuming acid. If you've got a chemist in your group who's a stickler for that kind of thing, just call it Alkahest Breath instead.

variant.name: Recovering the Treasure
entries: A creature proficient in alchemy tools may use them to attempt a {@dc 15} ability check over the course of a work day, precipitating {@dice 2d10} x 100gp worth of gold dust out of the acid on a success. A creature may attempt this check any number of times, though the total amount of gold recovered in this way is limited by the amount originally disolved in the acid. A creature that fails this check by 5 or more exhausts their supply of reagents and must acquire a new kit to attempt it again.

entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: You Haven't Heard the Best Part
entries: A creature {@condition frightened} by the dragon cannot move further away from it while it is telling a story.

action.name: Breath of Deepening Sleep {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} and gain 31 ({@dice 9d6}) temporary hit points, or 66 ({@dice 19d6}) temporary hit points if it failed the save by 5 or more. This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

reaction.name: I Wasn't Finished!
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the dragon with an attack or harmful spell while the dragon is telling a story, the dragon ends the story and uses one of its breath weapons, if available.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 329 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: This Reminds Me... (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. While the dragon is telling a story, it cannot use its breath weapons, and a creature that can hear the dragon and attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell must first make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
The dragon can continue the story as a bonus action on each of its turns, extending the duration until the end of its following turn.

legendary.name: Calm The Unruly
entries: The dragon shoots a wilting glare at one creature within 30 ft, ending one condition affecting it. The condition can be {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, Hasted, Polymorphed, or Raging.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Burrowing Retreat
entries: The dragon moves up to half its burrow speed. If burrowing in sand, each creature within 15 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's turn.

entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: Burning Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 ft. of the dragon takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dragon peut utiliser sa Présence effrayante. Il effectue ensuite trois attaques : une avec sa morsure et deux avec ses griffes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20})

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath of Lingering Flames {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in an 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide and persists until the end of its next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in that line, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 56 ({@damage 16d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a successful save.

action.name: Breath of Deepening Sleep {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes and gain 28 ({@dice 8d6}) temporary hit points, or 56 ({@dice 16d6}) temporary hit points if it failed the save by 5 or more. This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

reaction.name: I Wasn't Finished!
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the dragon with an attack or harmful spell while the dragon is telling a story, the dragon ends the story and uses one of its breath weapons, if available.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 149 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

reaction.name: Billowing Wings
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dragon may shroud itself in smoke, then immediately move up to half its speed. The area in 60 foot radius becomes heavily obscured until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: This Reminds Me... (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. While the dragon is telling a story, it cannot use its breath weapons, and a creature that can hear the dragon and attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell must first make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
The dragon can continue the story as a bonus action on each of its turns, extending the duration until the end of its following turn.

legendary.name: Calm The Unruly
entries: The dragon shoots a wilting glare at one creature within 30 ft, ending one condition affecting it. The condition can be {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, Hasted, Polymorphed, or Raging.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Burrowing Retreat
entries: The dragon moves up to half its burrow speed. If burrowing in sand, each creature within 15 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: Burning Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 ft. of the dragon takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dragon peut utiliser sa Présence effrayante. Il effectue ensuite trois attaques : une avec sa morsure et deux avec ses griffes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Chaque créature du choix du dragon qui se trouve dans un rayon de 120 pieds autour du dragon et qui est consciente de celui-ci doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 16} ou devenir {@condition frightened} pendant 1 minute. Une créature peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite. Si le jet de sauvegarde d'une créature est réussi ou si l'effet prend fin pour elle, la créature est immunisée contre la présence effrayante du dragon pendant les 24 heures suivantes.

action.name: This Reminds Me..
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. While the dragon is telling a story, it cannot use its breath weapons, and a creature that can hear the dragon and attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell must first make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
The dragon can continue the story as a bonus action on each of its turns, extending the duration until the end of its following turn.

This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

action.name: Claw

entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

entries: The dragon exhales fire in an 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide and persists until the end of its next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in that line, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 42 ({@damage 12d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a successful save.

action.name: Breath of Deepening Sleep
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute and gain 10 ({@dice 3d6}) temporary hit points, or 21 ({@dice 6d6}) temporary hit points if it failed the save by 5 or more. This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

reaction.name: I Wasn't Finished!
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the dragon with a melee attack while the dragon is telling a story, the dragon ends the story and uses one of its breath weapons, if available.

trait.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: This Reminds Me..
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. While the dragon is telling a story, it cannot use its breath weapons, and a creature that can hear the dragon and attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell must first make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.

trait.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

trait.name: Breath of Lingering Flames
entries: The dragon exhales fire in an 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide and persists until the end of its next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in that line, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a successful save.

trait.name: Breath of Deepening Sleep
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute and gain 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hit points, or 14 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hit points if it failed the save by 5 or more. This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

reaction.name: I Wasn't Finished!
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the dragon with a melee attack while the dragon is telling a story, the dragon ends the story and uses one of its breath weapons, if available.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: Le dragon peut se déplacer sur des surfaces glacées et les escalader sans avoir besoin de faire un test d'aptitude. De plus, un terrain difficile composé de glace ou de neige ne lui coûte pas de mouvement supplémentaire.

trait.name: Sluggish Chill
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be unable to make more than a single attack on its turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dragon peut utiliser sa Présence effrayante. Il effectue ensuite quatre attaques : une avec sa morsure, deux avec ses griffes et une avec sa queue. Il ne peut pas faire ses attaques de morsure et de queue contre la même cible.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 300 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw, taking 90 ({@damage 20d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain, and a creatue that starts its turn in it or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ice Tomb Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of ice in a 300-foot cone that clings to living creatures, sapping their vitality. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature gains 45 ({@dice 10d8}) temporary HP. As long as it has this temporary HP, the creature is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and has vulnerability to fire damage. A creature that starts its turn with any of this temporary HP must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend three hit dice. If it cannot, it drops to 0 HP.

reaction.name: Sudden Pounce
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 120 feet of the dragon ending its turn further away than it started, the dragon moves up to its speed toward the creature without provoking attacks of opportunity and makes a claw attack.

reaction.name: Freezing Blood
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dragon adds 3 to its AC until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 262 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Freezing Breath.

legendary.name: Raise Hackles
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or lose any immunity it has to the dragon's Frightful Presence or the {@condition frightened} condition.

legendary.name: Terrorize
entries: One {@condition frightened} creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage. On the creature's next turn, it must use its movement to run away from the dragon.

legendary.name: Uttercold
entries: Le dragon puise dans ses réserves les plus profondes. Jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour, les dégâts de froid que le dragon inflige ignorent la résistance aux dégâts, et le dragon perd l'une de ses résistances légendaires.

entries: Chaque créature du choix du dragon qui se trouve dans un rayon de 120 pieds autour du dragon et qui est consciente de celui-ci doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 16} ou devenir {@condition frightened} pendant 1 minute. action.name: Ice Tomb Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Le dragon exhale une explosion de glace dans un cône de 90 pieds qui s'accroche aux créatures vivantes, sapant leur vitalité. Chaque créature dans la zone doit effectuer un jet de sauvegarde de Force {@dc 22}. En cas d'échec, la créature gagne 45 ({@dice 10d8}) de HP temporaires. Tant qu'elle a ces HP temporaires, la créature est {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, et a une vulnérabilité aux dégâts de feu. Une créature qui commence son tour avec l'un de ces HP temporaires doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Constitution {@dc 16} ou être forcée de dépenser deux dés de résistance. Si elle n'y parvient pas, elle tombe à 0 HP.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Slag Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 105 ({@damage 30d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The stone in the affected area begins to melt, becoming difficult terrain. At the beginning of the dragon's next turn, the affected area becomes lava, and remains in that state until the beginning the dragon's following turn. A creature that starts its turn in lava or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Malicious Flame Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon breathes malicious intent into all flames in a 300-foot cone. The dragon summons a fire elemental in the space of each creature in the area that is on fire. The fire elementals act on initiative count 20.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 369 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Slag Breath.

reaction.name: Billowing Wings
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dragon may shroud itself in smoke, then immediately move up to half its speed. The area in 60 foot radius becomes heavily obscured until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: One creature within 90 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage and catch fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

legendary.name: Burn Away
entries: One creature within 90 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage and have one magical effect on it end.

legendary.name: Inhale
entries: Le dragon effectue un jet pour recharger l'une de ses armes respiratoires.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: Searing Aura
entries: Lorsqu'une créature sans résistance au feu commence son tour à moins de 3 mètres du dragon, elle prend feu et commence à brûler. Jusqu'à ce que quelqu'un prenne une action pour éteindre le feu, la créature subit 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dégâts de feu au début de chacun de ses tours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dragon peut utiliser sa Présence effrayante. Il effectue ensuite trois attaques : une avec sa morsure et deux avec ses griffes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20})

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The stone in the affected area begins to melt, becoming difficult terrain. At the beginning of the dragon's next turn, the affected area becomes lava, and remains in that state until the beginning the dragon's following turn. A creature that starts its turn in lava or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Malicious Flame Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Le dragon souffle des intentions malveillantes dans toutes les flammes situées dans un cône de 90 pieds. Le dragon invoque un élémentaire de feu dans l'espace de chaque créature de la zone qui est en feu. Les élémentaires de feu agissent sur un compte d'initiative de 20.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 273 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

reaction.name: Billowing Wings
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dragon may shroud itself in smoke, then immediately move up to half its speed. The area in 60 foot radius becomes heavily obscured until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: One creature within 90 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage and catch fire. entries: Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and pushed up to 15 feet away from the dragon.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: Searing Aura
entries: When a creature without fire resistance starts its turn within 5 feet of the dragon, it catches fire and begins to burn. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dragon peut utiliser sa Présence effrayante. Il effectue ensuite trois attaques : une avec sa morsure et deux avec ses griffes.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Chaque créature du choix du dragon qui se trouve dans un rayon de 120 pieds autour du dragon et qui est consciente de celui-ci doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 19} ou devenir {@condition frightened} pendant 1 minute. Une créature peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Bite

trait.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) fire damage and catching fire on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 10 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame hitting it with an attack or harmful spell, the dragon may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or catch fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Forest Walk
entries: Le mouvement du dragon n'est pas entravé par le feuillage naturel ou magique.

trait.name: Poison Wounds
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the dragon takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, or 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage if it has less than half its hit points.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: Le dragon a l'avantage sur les tests de furtivité s'il se trouve à plus de 30 pieds d'une créature hostile.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It may replace one claw attack with a tail attack.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. The target must then succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or lose any resistance to poison damage for the next minute. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more also loses any immunity to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition for the next minute.

action.name: Claw

action.name: Entangling Vines {@recharge 5}
entries: Barbed vines burst from the ground in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. Until the dragon uses this ability again, the area is difficult terrain. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) piercing damage for every 5 feet it travels.

reaction.name: Adapt Camouflage
entries: En réaction au fait d'être touché par une attaque à distance, le dragon peut adapter son apparence à son environnement immédiat. Jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour, le dragon devient {@condition invisible} aux créatures situées à plus de 30 pieds de lui.

entries: As a reaction to a creature within 30 feet resisting or negating a source of poison damage, the dragon may move up to half its speed and makes a bite attack against the creature.

entries: Le dragon effectue une attaque de griffes contre une créature dont il est caché. Si l'attaque touche, la cible est {@condition grappled}, {@condition stunned}, et cachée de ses alliés jusqu'au début de son prochain tour. Cette attaque ne révèle pas automatiquement la position du dragon.

entries: Le dragon se déplace jusqu'à la moitié de sa vitesse de vol. Les attaques d'opportunité provoquées par ce mouvement sont effectuées avec un désavantage. S'il termine ce mouvement dans une zone au moins à moitié couverte, il peut immédiatement tenter de se cacher.

entries: As a reaction to a creature the dragon is hidden from entering its reach, the dragon makes a claw attack. If the attack hits, the target is {@condition grappled}, {@condition stunned}, and hidden from its allies until the beginning of its next turn. This attack does not automatically reveal the dragon's position.

trait.name: Forest Walk
entries: Le mouvement du dragon n'est pas entravé par le feuillage naturel ou magique.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: Le dragon a l'avantage sur les tests de furtivité s'il se trouve à plus de 30 pieds d'une créature hostile.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's next turn.

reaction.name: Adapt Camouflage
entries: En réaction au fait d'être touché par une attaque à distance, le dragon peut adapter son apparence à son environnement immédiat. Jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour, le dragon devient {@condition invisible} aux créatures situées à plus de 30 pieds de lui.

reaction.name: Savage
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 20 feet resisting a source of poison damage, the dragon may move up to half its speed and makes a bite attack against the creature.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: Building Charge
entries: When the dragon rolls to recharge its lightning breath, creatures within 10 feet of it take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage. If the dragon succesfully recharges its lightning breath, creatures within 10 feet of it take an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It may replace one claw attack with a tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales lightning in a 300-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 99 ({@damage 18d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon may instead direct its breath at the sky. If it does, five lightning bolts each strike a seperate 5 ft. radius area within 300 feet. A creature in the area of one or more of them must save against the breath weapon.

action.name: Wilting Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon inhales, draining the moisture from a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that cone must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw, taking 81 ({@damage 18d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Discharge
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the dragon may force the spell's caster to take {@damage 1d10} damage per level of the spell.

reaction.name: Sandstorm
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the dragon may force the attacker to make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 331 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: Ionic Attunement
entries: Une créature située à moins de 60 pieds doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Constitution {@dc 24} ou perdre toute résistance à la foudre dont elle dispose et subir un désavantage à son prochain jet de sauvegarde de Dextérité dans la minute suivante.

legendary.name: Gather Charge
entries: Le dragon se déplace à la vitesse de sa marche ou de son terrier. S'il est touché par une attaque au cours de ce mouvement, il peut immédiatement effectuer un jet pour recharger une de ses armes à souffle. Il peut se déplacer à travers des créations de force magique avec ce mouvement, les détruisant.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 20 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si le dragon échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: Building Charge
entries: Lorsque le dragon effectue un jet pour recharger son souffle de foudre, les créatures situées à 10 pieds de lui subissent {@damage 2d6} de dégâts de foudre. Si le dragon réussit à recharger son souffle de foudre, les créatures situées à 3 mètres de lui subissent {@damage 2d6} de dégâts de foudre supplémentaires.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

Une créature peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite. Si le jet de sauvegarde d'une créature est réussi ou si l'effet prend fin pour elle, la créature est immunisée contre la présence effrayante du dragon pendant les 24 heures suivantes.

entries: Le dragon bat des ailes. Chaque créature située à moins de 15 pieds du dragon doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de {@dc 24} de Dextérité ou subir 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) dégâts de matraquage et être assommée {@condition prone}.
